sections.description: Implement rich functions for themes base on prestabrain wordpress framework and load widgets for theme used, this is required.
sections.installation: Upload or install by notice required the Wpopal Framework For Themes plugin to your site, Activate it.
sections.changelog:
Changelog.

1.2.4.3

Release Date - 15 August 2016

  • Fix function import data.

1.2.4.2

Release Date - 03 August 2016

  • Add file language for plugin.
  • Add Instagram social for Social widget.
  • Fix some mirror bugs.

1.2.4

Release Date - 25 March 2016

  • Fix notice layout widgets.

1.2.3

Release Date - 02 March 2016

  • Add field upload image for PBR Popup Newsletter Widget.

1.2.2

Release Date - 23 February 2016

  • Fix config link brands.
  • Add field style in config element brands.
  • Remove field image in element brands.
  • Added field config colums testimonial.
  • Remove field Excerpt in posttye Testimonial.

1.2.1

Release Date - 20 February 2016

  • Added check update plugin.
